name: 陳聿寬
objective: 本課程盼能透過閱讀西方經典作品，幫助學生能以較為宏觀的視野來看待不同的文化，並能深入了解西方文明。課程將介紹西方文學、歷史以及文化各方面最具影響力的作品，讓不同學門的同學也能有堅實的人文基礎。
schedule:
Week 1:  Course Orientation 
Week 2:  Selected works of Spencer Holst
Week 3:  Selected works of Julia Alvarez
Week 4:  Selected works of Thomas Beller
Week 5:  Selected works of Thomas Beller
Week 6:  Selected works of Ernest Hemingway
Week 7:  Selected works of Ernest Hemingway
Week 8:  Selected works of Hans Christian Andersen
Week 9:  Selected works of Hans Christian Andersen
Week 10: Selected works of Sarah Orne Jewett
Week 11: Selected works of Sarah Orne Jewett
Week 12: Selected works of Alexander Pushkin
Week 13: Selected works of Alexander Pushkin
Week 14: Selected works of Alice Walker
Week 15: Selected works of Alice Walker
Week 16: Selected works of Brent Staples
Week 17: Selected works of Brent Staples
Week 18: Wrap-up & Final Exam/Final Paper Due
scorePolicy:
期中會考：20%
班級期末考：20%
報告：20%
討論：20%
出席：20%
